title: Beniwal Music Center marketing website (single-page responsive landing)

requirements.summary: Create a responsive landing/home section that introduces “Beniwal Music Center” and summarizes offerings.
acceptanceCriteria: Page shows the title “Beniwal Music Center” prominently.
Landing section includes a short description of the shop in English.
Layout is responsive (mobile + desktop) and visually coherent.

file_operations.description: Create the single-page marketing layout with a clear landing/hero section containing the prominent “Beniwal Music Center” title and an English intro + brief summary of main offerings; render all required sections in a responsive layout.
Ensure the document metadata/title remains “Beniwal Music Center” and is consistent with the in-app header/hero branding.

requirements.summary: Add an informational “Tractor Music Systems” section describing products/services (no checkout).
acceptanceCriteria: A section labeled “Tractor Music Systems” is present and easy to find via scrolling/navigation.
Section contains English descriptive text (not placeholder lorem ipsum).

file_operations.description: Add a dedicated “Tractor Music Systems” section with English informational copy (services/products overview only; no cart/checkout elements) and a stable section anchor/id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add an informational “Tractor Modification Materials” section mentioning reasonable prices.
acceptanceCriteria: A section labeled “Tractor Modification Materials” is present.
Section explicitly mentions “reasonable prices” (or equivalent phrasing) in English.

file_operations.description: Add a dedicated “Tractor Modification Materials” section with English copy that explicitly communicates materials are available at reasonable prices, plus a stable section anchor/id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add an “Electrical Mechanic Services” section stating an electrical mechanic is available.
acceptanceCriteria: A section labeled “Electrical Mechanic Services” (or very similar) is present.
Section clearly states availability of an electrical mechanic in English.

file_operations.description: Add a dedicated “Electrical Mechanic Services” section with English copy that clearly states an electrical mechanic is available, plus a stable section anchor/id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add a “Contact” section with placeholders for phone, address, and hours to be filled later.
acceptanceCriteria: A section labeled “Contact” is present.
Contact section includes placeholders for at least: Phone, Address, and Hours.
Placeholders are clearly marked as “To be added” / “Coming soon” (or similar), not fake data.

file_operations.description: Add a “Contact” section containing clearly labeled placeholders for Phone, Address, and Business Hours marked as “To be added/Coming soon”, plus a stable section anchor/id for navigation.

requirements.summary: Add simple, mobile-friendly navigation to jump to each section (Home, Tractor Music Systems, Tractor Modification Materials, Electrical Mechanic Services, Contact).
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation is visible on desktop and usable on mobile (e.g., stacked or menu).
Clicking each nav item scrolls/jumps to the correct section.

file_operations.description: Implement a header navigation with links that jump/scroll to the correct in-page section anchors (Home, Tractor Music Systems, Tractor Modification Materials, Electrical Mechanic Services, Contact), ensuring the nav adapts for mobile (e.g., stacked/collapsible).

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive, tractor/automotive-appropriate visual theme that avoids a blue/purple-dominant palette.
acceptanceCriteria: Typography, buttons/links, and section styling look consistent across the page.
Primary color palette is not predominantly blue/purple.
Design feels appropriate for an automotive/tractor services shop (clean, bold, practical).

file_operations.description: Create global styles and Tailwind base layers (including CSS variables used by the template) with a warm, rugged automotive/tractor palette (avoiding blue/purple-dominant tones) and consistent typography/spacing defaults across sections.
Adjust/extend theme tokens as needed to support the cohesive non-blue/purple brand styling (colors/typography/spacing) used across the site while keeping the design clean and practical.
Apply consistent section styling, typography hierarchy, and button/link styling using the site theme to ensure a cohesive look across the entire single-page layout.

requirements.summary: Add generated static image assets (logo + hero banner) under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Logo is displayed in the header/hero area.
Hero/banner image is displayed in the landing section without layout shift or distortion.

file_operations.description: Add the generated logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bmc-logo.dim_512x512.png (static public asset to be referenced by the UI).
Add the generated hero banner asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bmc-hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png (static public asset to be referenced by the UI).

Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/bmc-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header/hero branding area and display frontend/public/assets/generated/bmc-hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png in the landing section with responsive sizing to avoid distortion and minimize layout shift.
